mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.code AS "code", a.courseCode AS "courseCode", a.studentCode AS "studentCode", a.discount AS "discount", a.payAmount AS "payAmount", a.paid_flag AS "paidFlag", a.paid_date AS "paidDate", a.paymentType AS "paymentType", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.memberFee_flag AS "memberFeeFlag", a.group_flag AS "groupFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ser_sale( id, code, courseCode, studentCode, discount, payAmount, paid_flag, paid_date, paymentType, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, memberFee_flag, group_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{code}, #{courseCode}, #{studentCode}, #{discount}, #{payAmount}, #{paidFlag}, #{paidDate}, #{paymentType}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{memberFeeFlag}, #{groupFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ser_sale SET code = #{code}, courseCode = #{courseCode}, studentCode = #{studentCode}, discount = #{discount}, payAmount = #{payAmount}, paid_flag = #{paidFlag}, paid_date = #{paidDate}, paymentType = #{paymentType}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, memberFee_flag = #{memberFeeFlag}, group_flag = #{groupFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT sale.id as 'saleId', stu.id as 'stuId', stu.nameCn as 'stuName', sexDict.label as 'sexName', courseLevelDict.label as 'courseLevel' from ser_course course LEFT JOIN ser_sale sale on sale.courseCode = course.`code` and sale.del_flag = '0' and sale.group_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN sys_base_student stu on stu.`code` = sale.studentCode and stu.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN sys_dict sexDict on sexDict.`value` = stu.sex and sexDict.type = 'sex_flag' LEFT JOIN sys_dict courseLevelDict on courseLevelDict.`value` = stu.courseLevel_flag and courseLevelDict.type = 'course_level' where course.courseAddress = #{courseAddress} and course.course_level = #{courseLavel} and course.learn_beginTime = #{learnBeginTime} and course.course_beginTime BETWEEN #{queryBeginDate} and #{queryEndDate} and course.del_flag = '0'
